items.title: Brokerage Radar: Investec lowers RBL Bank target, Morgan Stanley trims IndusInd Bank price aim
items.description: Check out the latest brokerage calls and analyst comments on the stocks in action today. Our coverage includes Dixon Tech, Adani Ports, Bajaj Finance and more.

items.title: Cochin Shipyard shares in focus on signing contract worth Rs 1,000cr with Defence Ministry
items.description: Cochin Shipyard Share Price | The contract is for short refit and dry docking of a large Indian Naval Vessel.

items.title: KEC International shares in focus on Rs 1,040 cr orders win in International markets
items.description: KEC International Share Price | The orders included supply of towers, hardware and poles in Americas and 220 kV transmission lines in CIS.

items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a positive start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Global stock markets rallied on Friday, with Wall Street crowning November with its biggest monthly gain in a year on post-election growth hopes, while the dollar eased amid prospects for firmer rates in Japan and easing in Europe.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The GIFT Nifty is indicating a firm start for the day.

items.title: Stock Radar: Maruti Suzuki, Hyundai Motor, Escorts, Cipla, Home First Finance, Aster DM, DLF, Greaves Cotton in focus on Monday
items.description: Stocks like Tata Motors, Eicher Motors, TVS Motor Company, Biocon, Cochin Shipyard, KEC International, RBL Bank, Bajaj Finance, GP Petroleums, Lemon Tree Hotels, Bharat Petroleum Corporation, and ONGC will also be in focus on December 2.
